head.title: Through a Glass, Brightly; Greetings From Tides Square

hedline.hl1: Through a Glass, Brightly; Greetings From Tides Square

abstract.p: Artist Alexis Rockman offers view of Times Square in 2054; drawing (Special Issue: Times Square at 100) (M)

block.p: As New York's temperature and sea levels rise, Times Square may have a soggy future. The local flora and fauna have already begun to shift with the changes. Monk parakeets (pictured on the oil drum) are a tropical species from Argentina and have been spotted in Prospect Park since the 1960's. One theory is that they emerged from a broken crate at J.F.K. Airport. Undoubtedly they will have a bright future, unless West Nile virus gets them.
